00024 UExprArray::UExprArray( const tstring& name, float indexScale, bool smooth, bool clamp )
00025 : _name( name )
00026 , _indexScale( indexScale )
00027 , _smooth( smooth )
00028 , _clamp( clamp )
00029 {
00030         _terms.reserve( 40 );
00031 }

00045 void
00046 UExprArray::AddElement( URef< UExprTerm > term )
00047 {
00048         _terms.push_back( term );
00049 }

00051 //----------------------------------------------------------
00052 float
00053 UExprArray::GetValue( float index ) const
00054 {
00055         if ( _terms.size() == 0 )
00056         {
00058                 return 0.0f;
00059         }
00060 
00062         index *= _indexScale;
00063 
00065         int arrayIndex = int( index );
00066         int arraySize = int( _terms.size() );
00067         int arrayMax = arraySize - 1;
00068         if ( _smooth )
00069         {
00070                 if ( _clamp )
00071                 {
00073                         if ( arrayIndex >= arrayMax )
00074                                 return _terms[ arrayMax ]->GetValue();
00075                         else if ( arrayIndex < 0 )
00076                                 return _terms[ 0 ]->GetValue();
00077 
00080                         float value0 = _terms[ arrayIndex ]->GetValue();
00081                         float value1 = _terms[ arrayIndex + 1 ]->GetValue();
00082                         float frac = index - Floor( index );
00083                         return Lerp( value0, value1, frac );
00084                 }
00085                 else
00086                 {
00089                         float value0 = _terms[ ( unsigned int )arrayIndex % arraySize ]->GetValue();
00090                         float value1 = _terms[ ( unsigned int )( arrayIndex + 1 ) % arraySize ]->GetValue();
00091                         float frac = index - Floor( index );            
00092                         return Lerp( value0, value1, frac );
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00097         arrayIndex = _clamp ? Clamp( arrayIndex, 0, arrayMax ) : arrayIndex % arraySize;
00098 
00100         return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->GetValue();
00101 }
00102 
00103 //----------------------------------------------------------
00104 bool
00105 UExprArray::IsDynamic( float index ) const
00106 {
00107         if ( _terms.size() == 0 )
00108         {
00110                 return false;
00111         }
00112 
00114         int arrayIndex = int( index );
00115         int arraySize = int( _terms.size() );
00116         int arrayMax = arraySize - 1;
00117         if ( _smooth )
00118         {
00119                 if ( _clamp )
00120                 {
00122                         if ( arrayIndex >= arrayMax )
00123                                 return _terms[ arrayMax ]->IsDynamic();
00124                         else if ( arrayIndex < 0 )
00125                                 return _terms[ 0 ]->IsDynamic();
00126 
00127                         float frac = index - Floor( index );
00128                         if ( frac > 0.01 && frac < 0.99 )
00129                         {
00130                                 return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->IsDynamic() || _terms[ arrayIndex + 1 ]->IsDynamic();
00131                         }
00132                         else if ( frac <= 0.01 )
00133                         {
00134                                 return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->IsDynamic();
00135                         }
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                                 return _terms[ arrayIndex + 1 ]->IsDynamic();
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141                 else
00142                 {
00145                         arrayIndex = ( arrayIndex % arraySize );
00146                         unsigned int nextArrayIndex = ( arrayIndex + 1 ) % arraySize;
00147                         float frac = index - Floor( index );
00148                         if ( frac > 0.01 && frac < 0.99 )
00149                         {
00150                                 return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->IsDynamic() || _terms[ nextArrayIndex ]->IsDynamic();
00151                         }
00152                         else if ( frac <= 0.01 )
00153                         {
00154                                 return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->IsDynamic();
00155                         }
00156                         else
00157                         {
00158                                 return _terms[ nextArrayIndex ]->IsDynamic();
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00164         arrayIndex = _clamp ? Clamp( arrayIndex, 0, arrayMax ) : arrayIndex % arraySize;
00165 
00167         return _terms[ arrayIndex ]->IsDynamic();
00168 }
